title: Japanese chicken yakisoba noodles
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons rapeseed oil', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '2 skinless chicken breast fillets, cut into bite-size pieces', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons chilli paste', '120ml soy sauce', '1 tablespoon rapeseed oil', '1/2 medium cabbage, thinly sliced', '1 onion, sliced', '2 carrots, julienned', '1 tablespoon salt', '900g cooked yakisoba noodles or straight-to-wok noodles', '2 tablespoons pickled ginger, or to taste (optional)']
